node.title: Romans Week 2: Why We All Need Jesus

node.name: Sonfest
node.shortDescription: Worship, be encouraged, and connect with other teens!

node.name: Back to School Bowling Party
node.shortDescription: Let's kick off the school year and welcome our new 6th graders.

node.name: Meet the Teacher
node.shortDescription: Parents and students are invited to come meet the teacher!

node.name: Living Proof Simulcast with Beth Moore
node.shortDescription: Join Beth and thousands of women worldwide as she shares truth to guide your own journey of faith.

node.name: Exploring Family Membership
node.shortDescription: Join us and discover what it means to be a Lifestone family member.

node.name: Raising Arrows Playdate
node.shortDescription: ALL moms are welcome! We meet every few weeks to let our kiddos play and enjoy connecting with women in our community.

node.name: See You at the Pole
node.shortDescription: A prayer rally where students meet at the school flagpole before school to lift up their friends, families, teachers, school, and neighbors!

node.name: Bring your Bible to School Day
node.shortDescription: Thousands of students across the whole country share God’s hope and celebrate religious freedom by doing something simple, yet powerful.

node.name: Music in the Park
node.shortDescription: The Lifestone band invites the entire community out for an afternoon of live Christian music!

node.name: 5 Year Anniversary
node.shortDescription: Make plans to join us for this exciting celebration at 9am or 10:30am!

node.name: No youth group October 31st
node.shortDescription: We'll take a break from Youth Group on October 31st.

node.name: Baptism
node.shortDescription: Fill out the form to let us know you're interested in being baptized, and we'll contact you with details.

node.name: Share the Warmth: Rescue Mission Drive
Operation Christmas Child
node.shortDescription: __Please bring boxes no later than Sunday, November 11th.__ Boxes and more info are available in Lifestone's lobby!

node.name: Can Food Drive
node.shortDescription: Let's stock the shelves at the Concern Center of Salt Lake this holiday season!

node.name: LADIES CHRISTMAS PARTY
node.shortDescription: Invite a gal pal and join us for a "Favorite Things" Christmas party & gift exchange!

node.name: Students Serve @ The Rescue Mission
node.shortDescription: Lifestone Students are headed to The Rescue Mission in SLC to hand out blessing bags and visit with people who are  experiencing homelessness.

node.name: Christmas Eve @ Lifestone
node.shortDescription: Invite your friends and family out and let's celebrate Jesus' birth with a candlelight service and Christmas carols.

node.name: Women's Bible Study
node.shortDescription: 12-week in-depth study

node.name: Men's Bible Study
node.shortDescription: 6-week in-depth Bible study

node.name: Ice Skating Play Date
node.shortDescription: ALL ladies are welcome! We meet up regularly to let our kiddos play and enjoy connecting with women in our community. Join us at the beautiful new Ice Ribbon behind Herriman City Hall.

node.name: Membership Sunday
node.shortDescription: We'll talk about what the Bible says about the importance of connecting to a local church, and you'll have the opportunity to commit to Lifestone as a member.

node.name: Football Sunday
node.shortDescription: You're invited to Football Sunday 2.3.19 @ Lifestone 9:30 AND 11am.  FEEL FREE TO SPORT YOUR FAVORITE TEAM JERSEY!

node.name: Ice Skating
node.shortDescription: Lifestone Students! Invite friends for a fun night at the Herriman Ice Ribbon. Register online.

node.name: Love & Respect Marriage Seminar
node.shortDescription: Whether single, married, or dating, their insight will bring life-altering truth to your relationships.

node.name: Intro to LifeGroups
node.shortDescription: 3-week LifeGroup mini-session led by Pastor Ben designed to help you discover why we love LifeGroups.

node.name: Baptism Sunday
node.shortDescription: Fill out the form to let us know you're interested in being baptized, and we'll contact you with details.

node.name: Ladies Night Out
node.shortDescription: Ladies! Enjoy a night out together at Thai Basil Restaurant in Riverton.

node.name: 3rd Annual Men's Bake Auction!
node.shortDescription: Men, it's time to get your bake on! Please make plans to whip up your favorite treat to help send Lifestone students to camp this summer.

node.name: Youth Camp 2019
node.shortDescription: WE CAN'T WAIT FOR CAMP! This summer we are headed back to Big Canyon Ranch in Wanship, Utah (near Park City) for camp!
